states.name: Geforce Gtx 1080
states.bigtext: Enjoy impressive Smart functionality with the Full HD M5500 TV. Discover the new Smart era with unlimited potential. Clear the clutter on your coffee table and control all of your compatible devices and content with One Remote Control. Take just 3 clicks to discover must-have entertainment on the powerful Smart Hub, ramp up the audio on your soundbar or surf the web on the big screen—all from a single remote. Experience complete control, even with your voice. Talk to your TV remote and effortlessly find shows and search content just by speaking. Even discovering a catchy theme tune or an epic soundtrack becomes effortless. Find out exactly what you’re listening to and reveal the names of songs playing in live TV. And you can take back control of how you watch TV with Samsung's Pause, re-wind or record live TV functionality*. *Additional purchase necessary for memory device required
states.shorttext: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus
